bio:
Rita Cidre is a marketer, designer, storyteller with over 10 years of experience working at the intersection of marketing and content. She was born and raised in San Juan, Puerto Rico (and is convinced  that's where her sunny, positive and creative energy comes from) but currently lives in Seattle. Rita has held growth marketing leadership roles at Zillow Group, Time Inc. and National Public Radio (NPR). Currently, as an integrated marketing manager at Qualtrics, she builds global campaigns and experiences that drive pipeline for their Employee Experience business. Rita also runs her own e-commerce line and teaches digital marketing at General Assembly, where she's been named Distinguished Faculty.  Her design work has been featured on NBC, Buzzfeed, Mit√∫ and Remezcla. She has an MBA from the University of Virginia's Darden School of Business and a BA from Brown University.
|
shortsummary:Renowned marketer, designer and storyteller with 10+ years of experience. She is the marketing manager at Qualtrics and has been ranked as a Top Growth Marketer by both Hubspot and Search Engine Journal.
title: Renowned marketer, designer and storyteller with 10+ years of experience.
